Data pregnant subject collect 4 5 month pregnancy telephone interview Registry . The Registry also contact subject 2 month 12 month estimate delivery date ( EDD ) post-natal & pediatric follow-up . If live birth report , infant 's HCP contact Pediatric Follow-Up 2 month 12 month age . If birth defect report , target follow-up conduct .
DOC.criteria: Have expose AMEVIVE® within 8 week prior conception time pregnancy Provide sufficient information determine pregnancy prospectively register ( i.e. , outcome pregnancy must unknown prospectively ) Provide verbal consent participate Registry , Verbally provide contact information , healthcare provider ( HCP ) , infant 's HCP ( applicable )
